Our PDF AI viewer only works with local PDF files at the moment.
Support for online PDF files is coming soon.
How to activate the extension on PDF file
Step 1: Open PDF file in browser
Step 2: Enable "PDF AI viewer" in extension settings
Step 3: Enable "Allow access to file URLs" in Chrome settings
Step 4: Re-open PDF in browser to use prompt on selected text
Protip: Make sure to enable both "PDF AI viewer" and "Allow access to file URLs" to activate the extension on PDF file

client.provider__openai_api__auth_description: Use your own OpenAl API key to power the extension.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_3_5__de: OpenAI's most capable GPT-3.5 model and optimized for chat at 1/10th the cost of text-davinci-003.  Will be updated with OpenAI's latest model iteration 2 weeks after it is released.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_3_5_16k: Same capabilities as the standard gpt-3.5-turbo model but with 4 times the context.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4__desc: More capable than any GPT-3.5 model, able to do more complex tasks, and optimized for chat. Will be updated with OpenAI's latest model iteration 2 weeks after it is released.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4_32k__: Same capabilities as the base gpt-4 mode but with 4x the context length. Will be updated with our latest model iteration.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_3_5_110: The latest GPT-3.5 Turbo model with improved instruction following, JSON mode, reproducible outputs, parallel function calling, and more. Returns a maximum of 4,096 output tokens.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4_0613_: Snapshot of gpt-4 from June 13th 2023 with function calling data. Unlike gpt-4, this model will not receive updates, and will be deprecated 3 months after a new version is released.
Snapshot of gpt-4-32 from June 13th 2023. Unlike gpt-4-32k, this model will not receive updates, and will be deprecated 3 months after a new version is released.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4_1106_: The latest GPT-4 Turbo model, enhanced for speed and efficiency, features advanced instruction following tailored for rapid response. It includes an optimized JSON mode for structured data handling, ensures consistent and reproducible outputs, and supports parallel function calling for multitasking efficiency. This model maintains a maximum output of 4,096 tokens, balancing comprehensive responses with streamlined performance.
client.provider__openai_api__model__gpt_4_visio: Ability to understand images, in addition to all other GPT-4 Turbo capabilties. Returns a maximum of 4,096 output tokens. This is a preview model version and not suited yet for production traffic.
client.provider__chatgpt__short_description: As fast as ChatGPT Plus. GPT-3.5-turbo, GPT-4-turbo, and GPT-3.5-turbo-16k.
client.provider__chatgpt__auth_description: Use ChatGPT to power the extension.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_3_5__descr: OpenAI's fastest model, great for most everyday tasks.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_3_5_16k__d: Same capabilities as the standard GPT-3.5-Turbo model but with 4 times the context.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_4__descrip: OpenAI's most capable model, great for tasks that require creativity and advanced reasoning.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_4_vision__: Also known as GPT-4 with Vision, or GPT-4V, represents OpenAI's most advanced iteration yet, combining robust image processing capabilities with the latest GPT-4 Turbo model, enabling it to interpret and respond to visual inputs in tandem with text.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_4o__descri: OpenAI's newest and fastest multimodal flagship model. Seamlessly combining text, audio, and image inputs and outputs, GPT-4o delivers near-human response times and exceptional performance across languages, vision, and audio understanding, setting a new standard for AI versatility and natural interaction.
client.provider__chatgpt__model__gpt_4o_mini__d: GPT-4o-mini is OpenAI's most advanced small-scale model, offering multimodal capabilities. This compact powerhouse delivers text outputs with intelligence surpassing GPT-3.5-Turbo while maintaining comparable speed. Ideal for smaller tasks, including vision-related applications.
client.provider__chatgpt__upload__accept_docs_a: Upload docs or images to MaxAI
client.provider__chatgpt__upload_file_error__to: The file uploaded is too large. Consider using an AI model with a larger context window, or uploading a file of a smaller size.

client.provider__poe__short_description: Access Claude beyond the US and UK.
client.provider__poe__auth_description: Use your own Poe to power the extension.
client.provider__poe__model__a2__description: Anthropic’s fastest model, with strength in creative tasks. Features a context window of 9k tokens (around 7,000 words).
client.provider__poe__model__a2_2__description: Anthropic's most powerful model. Particularly good at creative writing.
client.provider__poe__model__a2_100k__descripti: Anthropic’s fastest model, with an increased context window of 100k tokens (around 75,000 words). Enables analysis of very long documents, code, and more. Since this is an experimental early access model, usage is currently limited to 100 messages per month for Poe subscribers (subject to change).
client.provider__claude__auth_description: Use Claude to power the extension.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_instant_: Anthropic's fastest model, 100K context window, great for very long document and code analysis, summarization, and comprehension.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_2_100k__: Anthropic's most powerful model, 100K context window, great for tasks ranging from sophisticated dialogue and creative content generation to detailed instruction.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_2_1_200k: The latest offering from Anthropic, Claude 2.1, boasts a 200K token context window and notably reduced hallucination rates, making it highly effective for precise analysis and summarization of extensive documents.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_3_haiku_: Anthropic's fastest model in its intelligence class, Haiku is a versatile solution for a wide range of everyday tasks.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_3_sonnet: Claude-3-Sonnet strikes a balance between intelligence and speed. Perfect for tasks demanding both precision and speed, such as data processing, sales optimization, code generation, and more.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_3_opus__: Anthropic's most intelligent model, with best-in-market performance on highly complex tasks. It can navigate open-ended prompts and sight-unseen scenarios with remarkable fluency and human-like understanding, showing us the outer limits of what's possible with generative AI.
client.provider__claude__model__claude_3_5_opus: Anthropic's latest breakthrough in AI, delivering frontier intelligence that's better than Claude-3-opus capabilities, and faster than Claude-3-sonnet speeds. Particularly good at complex tasks, coding, data science, visual processing, and writing.
client.provider__gemini__short_description: Google's most capable and general model, built from the ground up for multimodality. Gemini on MaxAI currently supports text and code and will soon add support for images, videos, and audio.
client.provider__gemini__auth_description: Use Gemini to power the extension.
client.provider__gemini__model__gemini_pro__des: Google's Gemini family, designed to offer scalability and exhibits strong generalist capabilities, supporting 38 languages and a context window of 32k tokens.
client.provider__gemini__model__gemini_1_5_flas: Gemini 1.5 Flash is Google's lightweight model, optimized for speed and efficiency with multimodal reasoning capabilities. Context window has been shortened to optimize for speed.
client.provider__gemini__model__gemini_1_5_pro_: Gemini 1.5 is Google's next-generation model offering enhanced performance, an efficient MoE architecture, and a breakthrough in long-context understanding with up to 1 million token windows, enabling advanced capabilities across text, code, image, audio, and video processing.
client.provider__free_ai__short_description: Designed for basic usage, it offers key features but does not encompass the extensive versatility and advanced capabilities of our Pro/Elite models. Ideal for newcomers exploring MaxAI features or for casual applications.
client.provider__free_ai__auth_description: FreeAI provides fundamental functionalities similar to other LLMs.
client.provider__free_ai__model__special__descr: Free AI provides basic, no-cost access to AI productivity tools, perfect for light or trial use. It lets you test MaxAI's basic features, with an easy upgrade path to the full, advanced MaxAI suite. We aim to improve Free AI continuously, reducing the difference between our free and premium AI options.
client.provider__free_ai__model__mistral_7b_ins: Mistral-7B-Instruct: Surpassing Llama 2 13B in efficiency, this 7.3B parameter model excels in all benchmarks, optimized for rapid response and extended context understanding.
client.provider__free_ai__model__openchat_7b__d: This model integrates OpenChat's open-source language capabilities, refined with Conditioned Reinforcement Learning Fine-Tuning, and trained on diverse data sets for nuanced understanding.
client.provider__free_ai__model__mythomist_7b__: A Fusion of Excellence – Crafted by the creator of MythoMax, this model amalgamates Neural Chat 7B, Airoboros 7B, Toppy M 7B, Zepher 7B Beta, Nous Capybara 34B, OpenHeremes 2.5, and more, to enhance ChatGPT roleplaying by reducing word anticipation, ministrations, and other undesirable elements.
client.provider__llama__model__llama_3_1_405b__: The world's largest openly available foundation model, rivaling top closed-source AI in general knowledge, steerability and math. Supports 8 languages and enables advanced capabilities like synthetic data generation and model distillation. Ideal for long-form summarization, multilingual conversational agents, and coding assistants.
client.provider__llama__model__llama_3_1_470b__: A powerful multilingual model with significantly expanded context length and enhanced reasoning capabilities. Supports advanced use cases like long-form text summarization, multilingual conversational agents, and coding assistance.
client.provider__llama__model__mistral_large_2_: Mistral's latest flagship model pushes the boundaries of speed and performance. With 123 billion parameters, Mistral-Large-2 excels in code generation, mathematics, and reasoning across dozens of languages. It offers minimal hallucination and impressive multilingual support for both natural and programming languages.

client.art__model__dalle3__description: DALL-E 3, developed by OpenAI, is a revolutionary text-to-image model that creates highly detailed images from textual descriptions, showcasing a significant advancement in AI-driven image generation.

This model is perfect for developers and researchers looking for high-performance image generation.

client.art__model__flux_1_pro__description: Developed by Black Forest Labs, FLUX.1 [pro] is the pinnacle of image generation AI. This state-of-the-art model excels in prompt adherence, visual quality, and output diversity. With top-tier performance, FLUX.1 [pro] is ideal for professional and enterprise users seeking the best in AI-powered image creation.
client.art__model__stable_diffusion_3__descript: Developed by Stability AI. Stability AI's most sophisticated open text-to-image model to date. This 2 billion parameter model delivers exceptional image quality, photorealism, and advanced prompt understanding while being resource-efficient for consumer hardware. Featuring improved hands, faces, and typography, SD3 Medium excels in spatial reasoning, compositional elements, and style flexibility. Ideal for both creative professionals and AI enthusiasts seeking high-quality, customizable image generation.

client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__gemini_2_0_fl: A highly efficient workhorse model designed for developers, excelling in high-volume and high-frequency tasks with low latency. It supports multimodal input and output, making it ideal for tasks requiring rapid and accurate responses. With a context window of 1 million tokens, it delivers enhanced performance across various applications.
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__gemini_2_0_pr: Google’s most advanced model, excels in coding and complex prompts. It delivers enhanced reasoning and world knowledge understanding, with best-in-class coding capabilities measured on benchmarks like LiveCodeBench. Featuring a 2 million token context window, it enables comprehensive analysis of vast information, making it ideal for advanced coding and intricate problem-solving tasks. Perfect for developers to tackle challenging tasks.
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__openai_o4_min: OpenAI’s compact, highly efficient reasoning model excels in math, coding, and visual analysis. With outstanding performance on benchmarks like AIME 2024/2025 and superior outcomes on non-STEM and data science tasks, o4-mini delivers fast, precise reasoning and supports high-throughput demands, while providing more natural and conversational answers than earlier models.
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__gemini_2_5_pr: A state-of-the-art thinking model designed to solve complex problems with advanced reasoning capabilities. It leads benchmark rankings by significant margins, particularly in math, science, and coding tasks. With a 1 million context window, it excels at multimodal comprehension across text, images, audio, and video. Its powerful reasoning abilities enable sophisticated analysis and problem-solving across diverse domains.
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__gpt_4_1__cont: A breakthrough model with exceptional coding performance, scoring 54.6% on SWE-bench Verified, outperforming GPT-4o by 21.4%. Features superior instruction following with a 10.5% improvement on MultiChallenge benchmark and sets a new state-of-the-art in long context understanding.
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__gpt_4_1_mini_: A significant leap in small model performance, matching or exceeding GPT-4o in intelligence evaluations while reducing latency by nearly half. Demonstrates remarkable vision capabilities, often outperforming GPT-4o on image benchmarks like MMMU and MathVista.
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__pro_chat__con: Choose a smarter AI: DeepSeek-R1, o3-mini, GPT-4o, Claude-3.7-Sonnet, Gemini-2.0-Pro, and more
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__claude_3_7_so: A hybrid reasoning model that integrates standard LLM and advanced reasoning capabilities, excelling in coding, front-end development, math, and physics. It delivers enhanced performance through extended thinking mode, improving task accuracy and providing visible thought processes. With a 200K context window, it supports complex code generation and deep reasoning tasks.
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__grok_3__conte: xAI's most advanced model featuring superior reasoning capabilities refined through large-scale reinforcement learning, enabling it to correct errors, explore alternatives, and deliver accurate answers across mathematics, coding, and knowledge tasks.
client.sidebar__promotion_dialog__llama_3_3_70b: Meta's Llama-3.3-70B is a high-performance multilingual model that excels in reasoning, coding, and mathematical tasks.
